<script type="text/javascript">
    

    //추가된 부분 개발1팀 이상묵 
    

   
    function showCaptchaImage(showCaptchar)
    {
        var step1Style = 'block';
        var step2Style = 'none';
        if (showCaptchar)
        {
            step1Style = 'none';
            step2Style = 'block';
            document.getElementById('imgCaptcha').src = "https://m.jobkorea.co.kr:443/Recruit/jkWebModule/jkCaptcha.aspx?gif=1";
        }
        document.getElementById('step1_1').style.display = step1Style;
        document.getElementById('step1_3').style.display = step1Style;
        document.getElementById('step1_4').style.display = step1Style;
        document.getElementById('step1_5').style.display = step1Style;
        document.getElementById('step1_6').style.display = step1Style;

        document.getElementById('step2_1').style.display = step2Style;
        document.getElementById('step2_2').style.display = step2Style;
        document.getElementById('capcharArea').style.display = step2Style;
        document.getElementById('btnInput').style.display = step2Style;
    }
    function onLoad() {
        if (document.getElementById('txtInputText').value == "") {
            showCaptchaImage(false);
        }        
        else {            
            showCaptchaImage(true);
            alert("잘못된 정보를 입력 하셨습니다.");
        }
    }
</script>
